meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>canopy</radical> under which someone has left a <radical>brush</radical> (in its 肀 form) next to the <radical>water</radical>, creating a scene of such <kanji>ease</kanji> and <kanji>peace</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: It turns out this place of <kanji>ease</kanji> and <kanji>peace</kanji> was created by <reading>こう</reading>いち, who suddenly comes in looking for the brush he left.
